rows.label: qev011701_MSG0001
rows.name: Hellooooo?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0002
rows.name: Dammit...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0003
rows.name: Anybody theeeeere...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0004
rows.name:
I could use some help here! ...Anybody?
Aaaaanybody at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, if I had my PREFERENCE,
a nice person would be best, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0006
rows.name:
Nobody? Really? Oh, come on.
...SOMEBODY HAAALP![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_JNK0010
rows.name: Respond

rows.label: qev011701_SEL0011
rows.name: Answer Mia's call for help.

rows.label: qev011701_JNK0020
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev011701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ignore Mia's plight.

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0007
rows.name: Huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0008
rows.name: ...AAAAUGH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0009
rows.name:
Somebody answered! A probably-real,
not-a-hallucination-this-time somebody![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0010
rows.name:
Thankyouthankyouthankyou! I know you must be SUPER
busy, and this must look SUPER suspicious, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0011
rows.name: PLEASE hear me out! Have pity![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0012
rows.name: Not gonna lie—I'm in a deep pile of suid dung here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0013
rows.name: So...pretty please? I'll be your best friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0014
rows.name: Hmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0015
rows.name: HmmmMMMMM? FOOTSTEPS?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0016
rows.name: Footsteps getting...quieter? Farther away?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0017
rows.name:
Wait, PLEASE! If you're a person and not some kind
of haunted space bear, WAIT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0018
rows.name: Please hear me out! Have pity![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0019
rows.name: Not gonna lie—I'm in a deep pile of suid dung here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0020
rows.name: I need your help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0021
rows.name:
Oh, man, thank goodness. I seriously didn't know
what I was gonna do if no one came.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0022
rows.name:
I mean, I could have DIED out here!
...Or, I guess, IN here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0023
rows.name: Heeey, wait a minute...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0024
rows.name: I know that voice! Chief! Is that you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0025
rows.name:
Unreal. I mean, really, what are the chances?
Pretty low, right? Like, nine percent?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0026
rows.name:
I'm calling it—this is fate! How else would
you turn up right at my darkest hour?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0027
rows.name:
Oh, right! Speaking of! You can probably tell
I'm in SERIOUS trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0028
rows.name:
I made it here to Cauldros okay, and the exploring
was going great at first...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0029
rows.name:
But at some point I guess I wandered into a
BAD NEIGHBORHOOD, xeno-wise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0030
rows.name:
Next thing you know, my Skell's a smoking pile of slag,
and I've kinda sorta been...taken prisoner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0031
rows.name: I'll fast-forward through the probe-y bits that followed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0032
rows.name:
Let's just say I'll file the whole thing somewhere between
"horrific" and "awkwaaard."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0033
rows.name:
Trust me, you don't want to know more.
Unless you do—in which case, not judging.
Buy me a drink and I'll catch you up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0034
rows.name:
Aaaaanyway! Tragedy plus time equals I'm still
stuck in here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0035
rows.name: SO HELP ME! ...Please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0036
rows.name:
The jerk guarding this cell always wears a blue uniform.
Not sure why.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0037
rows.name:
But she's got to be the one carrying the key...thingy
that opens this door.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0038
rows.name: I'm counting on you, Chief![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0039
rows.name:
Get the key thingy off the blue-uniformed alien lady
and get me OUT of here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0040
rows.name: Pleeeeease![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0041
rows.name: Hey, sorry, um...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0042
rows.name:
Don't wanna pressure anybody here,
but could you maaaaaybe hurry up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0043
rows.name: Blue uniform. Key thingy. Me, out of here. Got it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0044
rows.name: Much appreciated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0045
rows.name: I'M FREE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0046
rows.name: I'm finally free after who-even-knows how many days![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0047
rows.name: Chief! Thank you so, SO much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0048
rows.name:
Granted, I'd have preferred a rescue BEFORE
all the probing, but hey, what can you do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0049
rows.name:
Could be worse, right? A little probing is better
than a lot, I always say! ...Or at least that's
what I'll say starting right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0050
rows.name:
Okay, good deal. I need to get back to the city
and tell all this to Walter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0051
rows.name:
Well, except for the probe-y bits.
Those are totally not his biz.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0052
rows.name:
Although since I did go and wreck an entire Skell,
I'll probably have to make a full report.
A full and...complete...report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0053
rows.name:
Especially seeing as I just kinda...borrowed that Skell
without asking anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0054
rows.name:
Plus, I'm practically a BLADE now!
Gotta give my report, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0055
rows.name:
The report about how I bravely infiltrated an enemy
installation for the sake of New LA's future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0056
rows.name: ...As a prisoner. THIS time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0057
rows.name: Next time, though, WATCH OUT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0058
rows.name: In any case, gotta report to Walter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0059
rows.name:
So, uh... I know you just rescued me and all,
buuuut...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0060
rows.name: think I could get a ride back to the city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0061
rows.name:
They confiscated all my gear, and I think we've
established that I CANNOT be trusted to get
around on my own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0062
rows.name:
You've already gone out of your way for me, right?
What's a bit more? ...Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011701_MSG0063
rows.name:
Right! Perfect. And know that you're my hero forever
because of this, Chief.[ST:wait ]
